name: SCP: Pandemic - Closed Beta
description:
SUBJECT TO MASSIVE CHANGES
AND VARIOUS IMPROVEMENTS - CURRENT STATE IS FAR FROM FINAL - ALTERED DIRECTIVE

Upon a devastating discovery of an entity that has Infected the human psyche, the SCP Foundation assumes a new directive that leaves their efforts of protection of normalcy and humanity completely renounced — the extermination of the human race.


CALL TO ACTION

Credible whistleblowers embedded in the SCP Foundation leak information to major organizations, such as the United Nations Global Occult Coalition (GOC), out of brim desperation for humanity's survival. The GOC, along with other world organizations such as the FBI Unusual Incidents Unit (DIU) and GRU Division P, organize militarized efforts against SCP Foundation facilities — with primary targets being the most high-risk. Your fireteam is assigned to Area 12, which houses the Psi-Z Program.


CONTAINMENT BREACH

Due to unknown events. Area 12 faces during your fireteam’s raid. Now, in addition to your mission directive, you must also survive against the horrors in the facility — from firearms to sharp teeth.


KEY GAME FEATURES
  • Semi-linear story, you are a fireteam going against the SCP Foundation during a containment breach. Experience 1-2 hours of story content in the base game.
  • Discover and immerse yourself in the rich story and lore, deeply inspired by the SCP-5000 canon by Tanhony.
  • Peek corners, breach doors, and engage in immersive tactical combat.
  • Detailed audio design with occlusion-based wall muffling, positioned voice-chat, and dynamic music and ambiance.
  • Battle against other players and test your combat readiness in a fundamental PvP mode.
PC FEATURES
  • NVIDIA® DLSS and Reflex Support
  • AMD® FidelityFX Super-Resolution (FSR)
  • Ultra-wide support

Affray has chosen to allocate 12% of sales earnings (after PayPal/Stripe fees) to Itch.io to keep this platform going and growing for fellow indie developers.
